serviceNetworkProviders.name: Calmbirth速
serviceNetworkProviders.description: Australia's most highly acclaimed childbirth education program
serviceNetworkProviders.overview: Calmbirth速 is a unique, transformational childbirth education program that incorporates mind-body medicine and utilizes guided relaxation and hypnobirthing-style techniques to teach women how to work with their body during labour.
serviceNetworkProviders.mission: To enable couples to experience a calm, positive birth through education, empowerment, and emotional preparation that addresses the psychological aspects of childbirth.
networkFeatures: Internationally recognized childbirth education program
Mind-body medicine approach with scientific foundation
Fear release techniques and guided relaxation methods
Weekend intensive program format for working couples
Hospital-based programs in major cities
Private and group session options available
Refresher courses for subsequent pregnancies
Birth partner support and involvement
Comprehensive educator training and certification
Cultural diversity and LGBTQ+ inclusive approach
Evidence-based curriculum development
Continuous professional development for educators
Gift voucher programs available
Educational podcast and online resources
Advocacy for positive birth culture change
certifications: Australian Health Practitioner Regulation Agency Affiliated
partnerships: Royal Australian and New Zealand College of Obstetricians and Gynaecologists
Major Australian Private and Public Hospitals
serviceNetworkProviders.culturalConsiderations: Calmbirth速 is an inclusive organisation that embraces cultural diversity and accepts all pregnant couples regardless of gender and sexuality. We acknowledge the Traditional Custodians of the land on which we live and teach our Calmbirth program, and pay our respects to their Elders past and present. Our program respects diverse cultural birthing practices and beliefs.
serviceNetworkProviders.socialImpact: Calmbirth速 has transformed the birth experiences of over 50,000 families across Australia and internationally. By addressing the psychological and emotional aspects of childbirth, we reduce birth trauma, increase positive birth experiences, and support healthier family transitions. Our advocacy work promotes cultural change in maternity care, encouraging respectful, woman-centered approaches to birth.

awards.title: Australian Business Award for Excellence in Training
NSW Premier's Award for Women in Business

serviceNetworkProviders.name: Kickeroos
serviceNetworkProviders.description: Premier kids soccer coaching network specializing in youth development and girls programs
serviceNetworkProviders.overview: Kickeroos is Sydney's leading network of youth soccer programs, providing professional coaching for children aged 18 months to 12 years. Our network includes specialized programs like SheKicks for girls and partnerships with complementary physical activity centers to create a comprehensive youth development ecosystem.
serviceNetworkProviders.mission: To develop confident, skilled, and passionate young soccer players through fun, inclusive, and professional coaching programs that build both technical abilities and life skills.
networkFeatures: Professional Football Australia certified coaches
Age-appropriate programs for 18 months to 12 years
SheKicks all-girls academy promoting female participation
Development pathway to elite soccer programs
Small group sizes for individual attention
Multiple convenient Eastern Suburbs locations
Active Kids voucher acceptance
Partnership with complementary physical activity centers
Holiday camps and birthday party programs
Positive coaching philosophy emphasizing fun and skill development

awards.title: Best Youth Soccer Program Eastern Suburbs

serviceNetworkProviders.culturalConsiderations: Kickeroos celebrates diversity and welcomes families from all cultural backgrounds. We acknowledge soccer as a universal language that brings communities together and are committed to creating an inclusive environment where every child feels valued and supported.
serviceNetworkProviders.socialImpact: Through our programs, we promote physical activity, social development, and confidence building in children. Our SheKicks program specifically addresses the participation gap in girls' sports, creating safe spaces for girls to develop skills and leadership qualities.
